class_notes:
(Complete Topic: Chemical Breakthroughs in the Age of Social Media)
(In this seminar, we will learn about recent breakthroughs in chemistry relating to medicine and discuss how society views them through the lens of social media. Topics that will be covered will range from antibiotics (production, application and public policy) to the human microbiome to genetically modified organisms. Throughout the course, modern examples of misinformation campaigns will be included as focal points for class discussions)
course_description: Special topics freshman seminar. Variable content. Please contact the instructor of record for specifics.
